Structs/LogFileSummary.html#/s:12SimpleL.name: fileName
Structs/LogFileSummary.html#/s:12SimpleL.abstract: Log file name providing identification and file management coordination.

Structs/LogFileSummary.html#/s:12SimpleL.name: size
Structs/LogFileSummary.html#/s:12SimpleL.abstract: Log file size providing file management analysis and storage coordination.

Structs/LogFileSummary.html#/s:12SimpleL.name: lastModified
Structs/LogFileSummary.html#/s:12SimpleL.abstract: File modification timestamp providing file tracking and temporal coordination.

Structs/LogFileSummary.html#/s:12SimpleL.name: levelCounts
Structs/LogFileSummary.html#/s:12SimpleL.abstract: Log level distribution providing statistical analysis and log file insights.

Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8.name: message
Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8.abstract: Primary log message providing comprehensive diagnostic information and logging content.

Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8.name: objectName
Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8.abstract: Optional related object name providing contextual debugging information and object identification.

Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8.name: objectData
Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8.abstract: Optional related object data providing detailed diagnostic information and analysis support.

Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8.name: level
Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8.abstract: Log level classification providing severity categorization and filtering capabilities.

Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8.name: isSnapshot
Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8.abstract: By default false, sets if this entry is a snapshot from a class

Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8.name: file
Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8.abstract: Source file name providing debugging location identification and source code tracking.

Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8.name: function
Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8.abstract: Source function name providing debugging context and execution location identification.

Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8.name: line
Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8.abstract: Source line number providing precise debugging location and code position identification.

Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8.name: timestamp
Structs/LogEntry.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8.abstract: Temporal timestamp providing chronological coordination and log timing information.

Structs/LogEntry.html.name: LogEntry
Structs/LogEntry.html.abstract: Log entry model providing comprehensive logging information with source tracking and diagnostic capabilities.

Structs/LogFileSummary.html.name: LogFileSummary
Structs/LogFileSummary.html.abstract: Log file summary model providing comprehensive log file analysis and statistical information.

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8Lo.name: debug
Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8Lo.abstract: Debug level for detailed development and troubleshooting information.

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8Lo.name: info
Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8Lo.abstract: Informational level for general application flow messages.

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8Lo.name: error
Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8Lo.abstract: Error level for error conditions affecting functionality.

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8Lo.name: critical
Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8Lo.abstract: Critical level for severe errors that may cause application failure.

Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8Lo.name: id
Enums/LogLevel.html#/s:12SimpleLogger8Lo.abstract: Unique identifier for the log level, using the raw string value.

Enums/LogLevel.html.name: LogLevel
Enums/LogLevel.html.abstract: Enumeration defining log severity levels for message categorization.

Classes/SimpleLogger.html#/s:12SimpleLog.name: listLogFiles()
Classes/SimpleLogger.html#/s:12SimpleLog.abstract: Lists all log files with comprehensive metadata and statistical analysis.

Classes/SimpleLogger.html#/s:12SimpleLog.name: logFileStats()
Classes/SimpleLogger.html#/s:12SimpleLog.abstract: Calculates aggregate statistics for all log files in the logging directory.

Classes/SimpleLogger.html#/s:12SimpleLog.name: loadLogEntries(fromFileNamed:)
Classes/SimpleLogger.html#/s:12SimpleLog.abstract: Loads and returns all log entries from a specified log file in reverse chronological order.

Classes/SimpleLogger.html#/s:12SimpleLog.name: log(_:level:isSnapshot:file:function:line:timestamp:)
Classes/SimpleLogger.html#/s:12SimpleLog.abstract: Logs a message with comprehensive contextual information for debugging and tracing.

Classes/SimpleLogger.html#/s:12SimpleLog.name: log(_:_:level:isSnapshot:file:function:line:timestamp:)
Classes/SimpleLogger.html#/s:12SimpleLog.abstract: Logs a message along with a structured data object for comprehensive debugging.

Classes/SimpleLogger.html#/s:12SimpleLog.name: snapshot(_:)
Classes/SimpleLogger.html#/s:12SimpleLog.abstract: Captures comprehensive environment snapshots for debugging and diagnostics.

Classes/SimpleLogger.html#/s:12SimpleLog.name: clearLogs()
Classes/SimpleLogger.html#/s:12SimpleLog.abstract: Deletes all log files in the logging directory for complete log cleanup.

Classes/SimpleLogger.html#/s:12SimpleLog.name: deleteLogFile(named:)
Classes/SimpleLogger.html#/s:12SimpleLog.abstract: Deletes a specific log file by its base filename for targeted log management.

Classes/SimpleLogger.html.name: SimpleLogger
Classes/SimpleLogger.html.abstract: A comprehensive logging utility for application-wide log collection, persistence, and analysis.
